item.title: SMR Interface Bug: Changing search/sort does not reset selected results page
item.dc:creator: @macdjord Macdjord
item.description:
@macdjord wrote:

When you enter a new search query or change the sort order of the results, you should be reset to page 1 of the (new) results. Right now, this doesn’t happen, which can lead to confusing results.

For instance, if you’re browsing through the complete mod list and are on page, say, 3, then try searching for something, then unless whatever search query you enter returns 3 or more pages or results you’ll see no results at all, making it look as if your query didn’t match anything; the only clue that this is not the case is the tiny page indicator in the corner.

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic
item.source: SMR Interface Bug: Changing search/sort does not reset selected results page

item.title: Mods on SMR need their own forum on their /mod/ page
item.dc:creator: @Melissa_Dupuis Melissa Dupuis
item.description:
@Melissa_Dupuis wrote:

As much as I appreciate and love this site, and many of the mods hosted here, there have been several mods that are causing crashes and multi-gigabyte error logs, with the authors of those mods having absolutely zero means of contacting them or giving feedback.

This type of communication is essential for mods, and gives ficsit.app the dubious distinction of being the first mod repository I’ve ever seen that doesn’t make it easy to contact authors with bugs.

Please, for the love of all things shiny, correct this glaring oversight. Your users like me will thank you.

~MLD

Posts: 3

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Mods on SMR need their own forum on their /mod/ page

item.title: Uniform nodes mod?
item.dc:creator: @andrew_gatenby ozmods
item.description:
@andrew_gatenby wrote:

gday from oz, up until the past couple of days i’ve been able to use this https://ficsit.app/mod/BvjoAkQLbHxwy2 but the author has updated it and now it’s elbusto if i try to use it, it will crash to the desktop lickety split… i cant find anywhere to contact the author, so i’m posting here, if this is in the wrong place then feel free to move it, i’ve tried to use the first version that worked fine but every time i load smm it seems to reset it to the latest, which is broken… any advice please, thanks

Participants: 3

item.title: The Utility Tool link in the tools section is out of date
item.dc:creator: @ParadoxImmobilizer Paradox Immobilizer
item.description:
@ParadoxImmobilizer wrote:

Utility Tool (satisfactory.greeny.dev) has been depreciated and is still using update 2 information. It was replaced with Satisfactory Tools, which can be found at www.satisfactorytools.com.
